info.name: Anibook - QA

request.description:
This request should return a list with n elements.
A limit can be specified

This request should return a single result.
The 'name' are case sensitive and includes space.
Ex: Mob, Mob 2, mob, mob2 this values going to return diffent results

Field accepts: folder, name, photo, synopsis, comment, images(an array of string), info(an object -> numberEpisodes), whereWatch and musics.
whereWatch and musics type: an object with language, url and name.
Files can be upload, in this case should be passed a query param for folder. The folder are used to create a file, when a file are send without a folder param, a undefined folder are created in server

Should have the query param 'folder'.
The 'name' are case sensitive and includes space. 
Ex: Mob, Mob 2, mob, mob2 this values going to return diffent results
